wiki.content:
Gary combines the delicate touch of the love affair with the torid angry guitar, then soars to the emotional heights with the wailing cry of the strings to declare the songs title.  So much like our real feelings in life.

wiki.summary: Gary combines the delicate touch of the love affair with the torid angry guitar, then soars to the emotional heights with the wailing cry of the strings to declare the songs title.  So much like our real feelings in life.

track.name: Always Gonna Love You
comments: He is a soulful and energetic performer who brings the best of what people love about music together in one total package: great stage presence and quality sound. His guitar is powerful and inviting in a way that makes you want to hear more. He also has the ability to create an exciting atmosphere anywhere. He can deliver his message on a broadly appealing level with a sincerity that comes through every note and every word.

I wasn't aware that he died last year. Damn

:' (
I love this song. I so connect to it. .....Gary we  will miss your talent!...... I was on last.fm when I heard of his death. How crazy is that. One of my favorite's  of all time <3<3<3
has control were others lack - amazing style
I always gonna love this song and many great ones from Gary!
Thanks Gary. And get your ass back to the United States.
moore's da betta ..... got just about everything the dude recorded,the dude is a monster!!!!
